title: Conservative Party Unable to Fully Commit Against Critical Race Theory
description:
Watch the full episode here:  https://www.lotuseaters.com/the-podcast-of-the-lotus-eaters-episode-1-09-11-20

The Conservative party Equalities minister has openly denounced Critical Race Theory and banned it from her department and public schools. 

However Boris and his cabinet continue to allow Critical Race Theory to be taught within the parliament and other government departments?

Find more content at https://www.lotuseaters.com/
